title: Bookjacket Design, "Front Cover from the NRF (Nouvelle Revue Française) edited by Justin O'Brien", 1958
medium: Lithography in black, grey, purple and orange inks
inscribed:
Imprinted on cover vertically at lower left edge in orange ink: E. Lustig.
Across the center in black and purple ink: From the/ NRF
At top center in purple ink: Essays from the/ Nouvelle Revue Française/ edited, selected,/ and introduced by/ (in black ink) Justin O'Brien
On back cover at center right in purple and black ink: NRF
At lower left in black ink on back: Tarrar, Straus and Cudany/ 101 Fifth Avenue, New York 3, N.Y
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Front cover for the NRF. The covers have an orange band running from top to bottom down the center and a grey one on the bottom. In the grey band are rows of names, probably authors of essays. On the right side of the cover is a synopsis of the NRF and the selected essays. The spine alsi has the editor and publisher information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket Design, "Front Cover from the NRF (Nouvelle Revue Française) edited by Justin O'Brien", 1958.
1958. Lithography in black, grey, purple and orange inks. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-55.
